name: Beans, Greens and Garlic Soup
author: Lisa Stinger
summary: This wholesome soup is quick and easy to make, and filled with lots of garlic flavor!
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup ditalini or other small pasta
1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach, rinsed and dried
salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large stockpot over medium heat
Stir in the garlic and onions; cook and stir until the onions are transparent, 8 to 10 minutes
Add the chicken broth, increase the heat to high, and bring the mixture to a boil
Stir in the beans and pasta; lower heat to medium, and simmer, uncovered, until the pasta is al dente, or 8 to 10 minutes
Add the spinach and stir just until wilted
Season with salt and pepper to taste
